comments.author: jruderman@gmail.com
comments.creator: jruderman@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 531169
testcase

###!!! ASSERTION: Want to fire DOMNodeRemoved event, but it's not safe: 'aChild->IsNodeOfType(nsINode::eCONTENT) && static_cast<nsIContent*>(aChild)-> IsInNativeAnonymousSubtree() || IsSafeToRunScript() || sDOMNodeRemovedSuppressCount', file content/base/src/nsContentUtils.cpp, line 3751

This is a recent regression, most likely from bug 650493.
comments.raw_text:
###!!! ASSERTION: Want to fire DOMNodeRemoved event, but it's not safe: 'aChild->IsNodeOfType(nsINode::eCONTENT) && static_cast<nsIContent*>(aChild)-> IsInNativeAnonymousSubtree() || IsSafeToRunScript() || sDOMNodeRemovedSuppressCount', file content/base/src/nsContentUtils.cpp, line 3751

This is a recent regression, most likely from bug 650493.

comments.creator: jonas@sicking.cc
comments.author: jonas@sicking.cc
comments.raw_text: We should move this code over to using RemoveChildAt and simply not fire mutation events. Parser doesn't in other cases anyway.
comments.text: We should move this code over to using RemoveChildAt and simply not fire mutation events. Parser doesn't in other cases anyway.

comments.raw_text: My fuzzer hits this assertion a lot, which slows it down somewhat.
comments.text: My fuzzer hits this assertion a lot, which slows it down somewhat.
